record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 1974

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 1974, introduced earlier today by Senator Kennedy and others, is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading, and I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will receive a second reading on the next legislative day.
